exceptions.exn: In environment E, E' : Ens H : IN E' (Union E) Unable to unify "EXType (pi1 ?M1435) (fun a : pi1 ?M1435 => EQ E' (pi2 ?M1435 a))" with "EXType Ens (fun E1 : Ens => IN E1 E /\\ IN E' E1)".

In environment H0 : forall E E' : Ens, IN E' E -> EXType (pi1 E) (fun a : pi1 E => EQ E' (pi2 E a)) E, E' : Ens H : IN E' (Union E) Unable to unify "match ?M1581 with | sup A f => EXType A (fun y : A => EQ ?M1579 (f y)) end" with "EXType Ens (fun E1 : Ens => IN E1 E /\\ IN E' E1)".

In environment H2 : forall E E' E'' : Ens, EQ E' E'' -> IN E E' -> IN E E'' H1 : forall E E' : Ens, IN E' E -> EXType (pi1 E) (fun a : pi1 E => EQ E' (pi2 E a)) E, E' : Ens H : IN E' (Union E) X0 : Ens Unable to unify "match Union ?M1876 with | sup A f => EXType A (fun y : A => EQ ?M1878 (f y)) end" with "EXType Ens (fun E1 : Ens => IN E1 E /\\ IN E' E1)".

In environment H4 : forall E E' E'' : Ens, EQ E' E'' -> IN E E' -> IN E E'' H3 : forall E E' : Ens, IN E' E -> EXType (pi1 E) (fun a : pi1 E => EQ E' (pi2 E a)) H0 : forall E E' E'' : Ens, IN E' E -> IN E'' E' -> IN E'' (Union E) E, E' : Ens H : IN E' (Union E) X0, X1 : Ens Unable to unify "IN E' (Union E)" with "EXType Ens (fun E1 : Ens => IN E1 E /\\ IN E' E1)".

In environment H5 : forall E E' E'' : Ens, EQ E' E'' -> IN E E' -> IN E E'' H2 : forall E E' : Ens, IN E' E -> EXType (pi1 E) (fun a : pi1 E => EQ E' (pi2 E a)) H1 : forall E E' E'' : Ens, IN E' E -> IN E'' E' -> IN E'' (Union E) E, E' : Ens H : IN E' (Union E) X0, X1, X2 : Ens Unable to unify "forall E : Ens, IN E ?M2747 -> IN E (Union ?M2746)" with "EXType Ens (fun E1 : Ens => IN E1 E /\\ IN E' E1)".

In environment e : Ens -> Ens H6 : forall E E' E'' : Ens, IN E' E -> IN E'' E' -> IN E'' (e E) H4 : forall E E' E'' : Ens, EQ E' E'' -> IN E E' -> IN E E'' H3 : forall E E' : Ens, IN E' E -> EXType (pi1 E) (fun a : pi1 E => EQ E' (pi2 E a)) H0 : forall E E' : Ens, IN E' E -> INC E' (Union E) H1 : forall E E' E'' : Ens, IN E' E -> IN E'' E' -> IN E'' (Union E) E, E' : Ens H : IN E' (Union E) X0, X1, X2 : Ens Unable to unify "IN E' (Union E)" with "EXType Ens (fun E1 : Ens => IN E1 E /\\ IN E' E1)".

In environment e0 : Ens -> Ens H8 : forall E E' E'' : Ens, IN E' E -> IN E'' E' -> IN E'' (e0 E) H7 : forall E E' E'' : Ens, EQ E' E'' -> IN E E' -> IN E E'' H5 : forall E E' : Ens, IN E' E -> EXType (pi1 E) (fun a : pi1 E => EQ E' (pi2 E a)) H2 : forall E E' : Ens, IN E' E -> INC E' (Union E) e : Ens -> Ens H6 : forall E E' E'' : Ens, IN E' E -> IN E'' E' -> IN E'' (e E) H1 : forall E E' E'' : Ens, IN E' E -> IN E'' E' -> IN E'' (Union E) E, E' : Ens H : IN E' (Union E) X0, X1, X2 : Ens Unable to unify "IN E' (Union E)" with "EXType Ens (fun E1 : Ens => IN E1 E /\\ IN E' E1)".

original: intros E E' H. apply IN_EXType with (E' := E'). - apply IN_sound_right with (E' := Union E). + apply IN_Union with (E' := E'). apply H. + apply IN_INC_Union. apply H. - apply H.
